body_html: If anyone's interested, I've avoided this by directly calling cudnn_convolution_backward_input and cudnn_convolution_backward_weight (by following this example https://github.com/pytorch/extension-cpp) instead of torch.nn.grad.conv2d_input and torch.nn.grad.conv2d_weight. Seems to be working perfectly for now.
